Name: Export-BinaryMiLog
Synopsis: Creates a binary encoded representation of an object or objects and stores it in a file.

Name: Get-CimAssociatedInstance
Synopsis: Retrieves the CIM instances that are connected to a specific CIM instance by an association.

Name: Get-CimClass
Synopsis: Gets a list of CIM classes in a specific namespace.

Name: Get-CimInstance
Synopsis: Gets the CIM instances of a class from a CIM server.

Name: Get-CimSession
Synopsis: Gets the CIM session objects from the current session.

Name: Import-BinaryMiLog
Synopsis: Used to re-create the saved objects based on the contents of an export file.

Name: Invoke-CimMethod
Synopsis: Invokes a method of a CIM class.

Name: New-CimSessionOption
Synopsis: Specifies advanced options for the New-CimSession cmdlet.

Name: Register-CimIndicationEvent
Synopsis: Subscribes to indications using a filter expression or a query expression.

Name: Remove-CimInstance
Synopsis: Removes a CIM instance from a computer.

Name: Remove-CimSession
Synopsis: Removes one or more CIM sessions.

Name: Set-CimInstance
Synopsis: Modifies a CIM instance on a CIM server by calling the ModifyInstance method of the CIM class.
